CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 17, 1955, pg. 2, reads: "A Loyal Friendship - This is what exists between Catherine Wallace, brilliant coloratura soprano, and two of her teachers, whom, she says have been loyal friends and benefactors during her pursuit of a musical career. Left to right: Mrs. Julia Bakaleinikoff and Mrs. Lincoln Maazel, assist Miss Wallace, center, in putting the 'finishing touches' on the program the latter will sing Friday night in a benefit concert at Central Baptist Church. Miss Wallace won a scholarship to the Juilliard School of Music, New York, recently. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Julia Bakaleinikoff seated at piano with "Masters of Russian Song" sheet music, singer Catherine Wallace, and Marion Maazel posed in interior with snake plants and portrait photographs on mantle
